name: CRT - Leave a channel while RHS is open

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Leave a channel while RHS is open
  1. Open a channel and post a message
  2. Open RHS
  3. Post reply to the message 
    1. Verify RHS and RHS textbox are visible
  4. Archive the channel
    1. Verify RHS is not visible 
    2. Verify that user is redirected to Town Square
inline.expectedResult: User can leave or archive a channel while RHS is open

inline.description:
Leave a channel while RHS is open when CRT is ON
  1. Set Collapsed Reply Threads to ON
  2. Open a channel and post a message
  3. Open RHS
  4. Post reply to the message 
    1. Verify RHS and RHS textbox are visible
  5. Archive the channel
    1. Verify RHS is not visible 
    2. Verify that user is redirected to Town Square
inline.expectedResult: When CRT in ON, user can leave or archive a channel while RHS is open
